infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to upload driver contact screenshots.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to take photos of driver contact information.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app does not access your calendar. This permission is required by a third-party library.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app does not access your contacts. This permission is required by a third-party library.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to help find nearby shuttle companies and calculate distances.
